roleset.name: remove or destroy totally
roleset.note: EXTIRPATE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'extripate' based on dictionary.com. Verbnet entry 10.1 44. (from extirpate.01-v predicate notes)
EXTIRPATION-N NOTES: Added by Julia for clearearth-biotexts.

example.name: extirpate-v: evil beware
example.text: John extripated the evil from world with his superpowers.

example.name: extirpation-n
example.text: If a predator hunts its prey species to numbers too low to sustain the population in the short term , they can cause not only the extinction or extirpation of the prey but also the extinction of their own species , a phenomenon known as coextinction .
